posts.post_content: @ Donovan\_Fabian: what are you talking about? You can run four in a deck which means you can have one producing 4 colorless and all 4 producing a total of 16. Combo with four [Vesuva](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vesuva) to get 8 colorless per tap, and 64 total. Also if you're running these in a deck with a splash of blue then you can combo with [Mistform Wakecaster](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mistform Wakecaster) use 2nd ability and get even more. Basically this card owns especially because of the new emergence of colorless eldrazi. Also if you aren't too big on using fat creatures then you can just do the same thing, get a splash of red and [Blaze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blaze) or [Fireball](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fireball) or [Comet Storm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Comet Storm) for an insta-win. Or if you're a green user, [Stream of Life](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stream of Life). No doubt that this card has other uses that i haven't thought of and even with the ones that i've just listed i think it still deserves the 5/5.

Posted By: DaJoshMaster (1/16/2013 2:59:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I don't think this card is as over powered as people think, it comes into play tapped so you can't do anything with it turn one, and on turn two you only have two mana to spend any ways, even if you are lucky enough to get [Amulet of Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amulet of Vigor) in your opening hand. compared to other mana ramp it actually lacks. and are you really going to run 4 amulet of vigor? and even then you might not get it, so what do you do run search cards? well now even more cards in you deck don't do anything. also this is assuming you get all of your cloudposts and vesuvas on que, which is unlikely and there is only a small number of cards you can use to search for them, and only one of them isn't green. so what are you going to do? run more search cards? run mana fixing to play green spells? or you could just go mono green and play all your eldrazi just as quick but more reliably.
posts.html:
I don't think this card is as over powered as people think, it comes into play tapped so you can't do anything with it turn one, and on turn two you only have two mana to spend any ways, even if you are lucky enough to get Amulet of Vigor in your opening hand. compared to other mana ramp it actually lacks. and are you really going to run 4 amulet of vigor? and even then you might not get it, so what do you do run search cards? well now even more cards in you deck don't do anything. also this is assuming you get all of your cloudposts and vesuvas on que, which is unlikely and there is only a small number of cards you can use to search for them, and only one of them isn't green. so what are you going to do? run more search cards? run mana fixing to play green spells? or you could just go mono green and play all your eldrazi just as quick but more reliably.

posts.post_content: I run 4 of these and 4 [Glimmerpost](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glimmerpost)s in my casual artifact deck.
